nodes.text: Hesperidium was one of the four moons of the galactic capital planet of Coruscant, located in the Core Worlds' Coruscant system. It was situated within the Coruscant subsector of the Corusca sector, located at the coordinates L-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid.

In the new Star Wars canon, Hesperidium was mentioned in the twenty-sixth issue of the magazine Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon, released in 2015. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Hesperidium first appeared in the 1997 novel Planet of Twilight, written by Barbara Hambly.
